page.title: 12Family life in Inversnaid
page.content: This is an extremely scattered community with very few facilities. The older children,who attend High School stay in Ellengowan Hostel in Callander. They leave Inversnaid at 7.00am on Monday,returning at 5.30pm on Friday. Guides,Brownies and Boy's Brigade are held in Aberfoyle. One family attends athletics in Stirling. There is no public transport. Strathclyde Water Authority runs a mini-bus 4 times a week into Aberfoyle for their employees. Groceries are delivered by this means. Most families shop in Stirling or Glasgow. The nearest doctor is in Aberfoyle and the hospital is in Stirling. A district nurse visits regularly. TheInversnaid Hotel is open to the public but closes in Winter. Communian is held 4 times a year.
